snippet: Twitter was aflutter on Friday with screen grabs for a security called "Greek Drachma (post Euro)," which briefly appeared on the Bloomberg terminal then disappeared. Business Insider notes that the Bloomberg help desk said it was "an internal...
abstract: Twitter was aflutter on Friday with screen grabs for a security called "Greek Drachma (post Euro)," which briefly appeared on the Bloomberg terminal then disappeared. Business Insider notes that the Bloomberg help desk said it was "an internal function" that was "set up to test."
